hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #1# major item.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path of #Skulls#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Wallet# and #a Huge Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Green Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Hookshot#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##the Market## has #8# major items.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Lab).text: They say that Jabu Jabu is no longer a pescetarian in Master Quest.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path of time.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #a Spirit Temple Small Key# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #generic grotto#.
